OrganisationRole.name: Funding
OrganisationRole.description: The government or organisation which provides funds to the activity.

OrganisationRole.name: Accountable
OrganisationRole.description: An organisation responsible for oversight of the activity and its outcomes

OrganisationRole.name: Extending
OrganisationRole.description: An organisation that manages the budget and direction of an activity on behalf of the funding organisation

OrganisationRole.name: Implementing
OrganisationRole.description: The organisation that physically carries out the activity or intervention.
